Description: For sale is a 2007 Gibson Limited Edition SG-3 3 Pickup SG in a beautiful Cherry with original case. This guitar is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches a couple small dings, and that is it. Overall, I would give it a solid 9 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.68" 1st Fret: 0.87" 12th Fret: 0.98" Neck Type: Slim Taper Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: 57 Classics Weight: 6lb 14oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
